titleStmt.title: To the most honourable assembly of the Commons House of Parliament. The humble petition of the distressed prisoners in the Kings Bench, and Fleete, and all others his Maiesties distressed subiects, now prisoners, within his Maiesties realme of England, and dominion of Wales.

notesStmt.note: "Urging an act for the release of prisoners of debt. ... A bill was read 18 Mar. 1624; ..." -- STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
